document.full_text: two service members from the nato-led force in afghanistan were killed when a helicopter crashed in a volatile eastern area on sunday, the coalition said, with the taliban claiming to have shot the aircraft down.
document.title: helicopter crashes in afghanistan's east, two troops killed
lines_and_colors: two service members from the nato-led force in afghanistan were killed when a helicopter crashed in a volatile eastern area on sunday, the coalition said, with the taliban claiming to have shot the aircraft down.
